SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Professional website creation services designed to help your business succeed online.

WEB_DEV.TITLE: Website Creation
WEB_DEV.DESCRIPTION: Custom websites tailored to your brand and business needs. From simple brochure sites to complex business websites, we create responsive, modern designs that work perfectly on all devices.

WEBAPP.TITLE: Transactional Web Apps
WEBAPP.DESCRIPTION: Advanced web applications with user accounts, payment processing, and complex workflows. Perfect for SaaS platforms, e-commerce sites, and business applications that need dynamic functionality.

SEO.TITLE: SEO & Content Strategy
SEO.DESCRIPTION: Optimized content and SEO strategies to help your website rank higher in search results and convert visitors into customers. We focus on both technical SEO and compelling content creation.

HOSTING.TITLE: Cloud Hosting & Care
HOSTING.DESCRIPTION: Reliable Kubernetes-based cloud hosting with ongoing maintenance, security updates, and technical support. Your website stays fast, secure, and always available.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: We create modern, cloud-ready websites that help businesses succeed online.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: We believe every business deserves a professional online presence. Our mission is to create beautiful, functional websites that not only look great but also drive real business results. From simple static sites to complex web applications, we build solutions that are scalable, reliable, and ready for the cloud.

VALUES.TITLE: Our Values
VALUES.VALUE_1: Quality craftsmanship in every website we build
VALUES.VALUE_2: Modern, responsive designs that work on all devices
VALUES.VALUE_3: Cloud-ready solutions built for scale and reliability

APPROACH.TITLE: Our Approach
APPROACH.DESCRIPTION: We combine modern web technologies with proven design principles to create websites that perform. Every project starts with understanding your business goals, then we craft a solution that's tailored to your needs. Whether you need a simple brochure site or a complex SaaS application, we have the expertise to deliver.

EXPERTISE.TITLE: Our Expertise
EXPERTISE.TECH_1: Modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js
EXPERTISE.TECH_2: Cloud hosting on Kubernetes for maximum reliability
EXPERTISE.TECH_4: Bilingual development for English and French markets
